messages.subject: Apology -- and Roald Dahl movies
messages.msgSnippet: Beg pardon -- should have changed the subject line. ... From: debi watson To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, October 09, 2002 11:04 PM
messages.messageBody:
Beg pardon -- should have changed the subject line.
----- Original Message -----
From: debi watson
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 09, 2002 11:04 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] nicknames


Matilda is a great favorite around here! James and the Giant Peach wasn't entirely accurate, either. The BFG had the kids giggling though. Debi

> wants to search for movies based on Dahl books, beyond Willie
> Wonka.

We thought Matilda was quite good and The Witches was quite bad, they
changed the whole story.
